main.name: Anish Patel
main.description: Software Development Engineer experienced in building scalable backend systems and cloud services. Passionate about solving complex problems and leveraging the latest technologies to create impactful software solutions. Currently seeking opportunities in fast-growing startups and midsize companies where I can contribute to backend architecture, cloud integrations, and system design.
main.bio: Curiosity drives me, technology excites me, and chess keeps me on my toes. As a Software Development Engineer, I am passionate about creating scalable systems and elegant backend solutions that solve real-world problems. When I'm not coding, you can find me diving into emerging tech trends or strategizing my next move in a chess game. Let’s connect and build something that makes a difference!
main.contactmessage: I hope you found my profile worthwhile and to get in touch with you !

resume.skillmessage: Proficient in Backend development with Java, Python, Node.js, and Groovy, and Frontend development with React, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.
resume.additionalSkills: I am a dedicated and self-motivated professional, always eager to learn new technologies and build impactful software solutions.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
education.description: Studied a variety of software engineering topics, gaining skills in programming, software development methodologies, and cloud computing. Developed teamwork and collaboration skills through academic projects and extracurricular activities.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed an internal application using React.js for frontend and Java for backend, using Docker and Kubernetes for containerization. Leveraged AWS services like Lambda, S3, and DynamoDB for data management. Automated security processes, reducing manual effort by 90%, and enhanced the Ring Vulnerability Management Platform by implementing data validation and encryption. Integrated advanced scanning tools into CI/CD pipelines for automated vulnerability detection.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, integrated with Java-based backend services and DynamoDB. Optimized application performance using AWS services, resulting in a 25% increase in system reliability. Participated in agile processes to deliver high-quality software, enhancing user experience and accessibility across multiple devices.

work.company: Math Department, San Jose State University
work.title: Workshop Facilitator
work.description: Worked as a Tutor for students of Math 100A and Math 100B classes. These are classes for students willing to enter SJSU but need to pass these classes before that.

projects.title: Hotel Reservation System
projects.category: Java GUI implementation of a hotel reservation system

projects.title: Netflix Clone Web-App
projects.category: A clone of Netflix, built with React.js for frontend and Java backend

projects.title: Personal AI-Powered Chatbot
projects.category: An AI-powered chatbot built for personal use, integrating GPT-3.5 with Dialogflow for NLU and context management.
projects.note: This project focuses on building a personalized bot with context management and advanced conversational intelligence.

testimonials.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.
It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer.
